file_content.text: Thank you again. I can't wait for this war to end.
I have no doubt of that. I'm sorry to hear that the Sith would not surrender. But in war, we all do what we must.
Thank you, once more, for your invaluable service.
Good luck smoking out those Sith.
Friend. We long for peace, but the Sith press us to war once more.
Major. It's good to have you and Havoc Squad here on Ilum.
Captain. You are a credit to free-traders everywhere. The Republic needs more enterprising citizens in its ranks.
Friend, citizen of the Republic. The dark side looms heavily over Ilum.
The Empire has struck at our non-human forces because they hate and fear the Republic's diversity. They know it is our strength.
The Lords of the Sith murdered our Kaleesh, Rodian and Talz commandos, and took over their forward camp. They showed no mercy.
They leave us no choice. I need volunteers to smoke the Sith Lords out of the buildings and if they do not surrender, take them down.
I will do my duty.
Sounds simple enough.
I would not celebrate the deaths of so many, even if they are our enemies.
I'm honored to have your help. Smoke the Sith Lords out and prepare for the worst.
There must be a better way.
I, too, would rather find a more peaceful solution, but the Sith have shown us on Coruscant, on Taris, on Corellia, that they only know violence.
The Sith Lords must be stopped before they overrun another camp.
In that case, I'll help.
You're right.
Let's hope Ilum is the last of this disgusting conflict.
Not interested. [Refuse quest]
Please reconsider. The Sith strike with abandon because they do not think we'll strike back.
I'm sorry. I'm too busy to talk right now.
